name: Dento Training Ltd
about: Dento Aviation, operating as Dento Training Ltd, is a renowned institution in aviation education with over 41 years of excellence. As an EASA Certificated Approved Training Organization, Dento Aviation has trained more than 4,600 successful pilots. The school offers comprehensive training programs, including web-based and computer-based training, to cater to both distant and on-site students. With a strong focus on safety and adherence to international standards, Dento Aviation provides business aviation type-rating training across various aircraft types. Its experienced instructors and state-of-the-art facilities ensure that students receive top-notch education, preparing them for successful careers in aviation. Dento Aviation sets the standard in aviation education, committed to producing highly skilled and competent pilots.
services:
["PRIVATE PILOT LICENSE
AB-INITIO COURSE
TYPE RATING COURSES
TYPE RATING INSTRUCTOR AND EXAMINER COURSES
LICENSE CONVERSION COURSE"]
